description.narrative: This project aims to promote the adoption of Wind Hybrid Power Generation (WHyPGen) technology through the facilitation of commercial on-grid WHyPGen systems for on-grid power supply within the Indonesian market.
first-order administrative division
Approved and enforced policies supportive of wind power generation projects
Number of formulated policies fiscal market regulatory institutional that are supportive of wind power generation including WHyPGen initiatives by EOP

comment.narrative:
4 formulated policies
1 Draft policy on wind power Feedin Tariff FIT
2 Draft National standard on Design requirements for small wind turbines IEC614002 Persyaratan Rancangan Turbin Angin Skala Kecil
3 Draft National Standard on Power Performance measurements of electricity producing wind turbines IEC61400121 Pengukuran unjuk kerja daya lisrik yang dihasilkan oleh turbin angina
4 Draft national standard on Measurement and assessment of Power quality characteristic of connected wind turbines IEC 6140021 Pengukuran dan pengkajian karakteristik kualitas daya pada koneksi ke grid turbin angin
To support the formulation of wind project permitting process the project conducted a capacity building program that involved local governments that has potential wind energy in their region The activity was mainly to give better understanding on the wind project development process and stages It is expected that through this program the central government and the local government will have equal understanding on their role and involvement in the process Furthermore the result of the program can also serve as an input in formulating a detail regulation on the permitting process of wind project especially for a large scale wind farm

description.narrative: Enhance awareness of the benefits of WHyPGen
An operational and widely used central database system on wind energy by Year 2

comment.narrative: Year 2

2014
Data reports prefeasibility study presentations etc that related to wind energy in Indonesia and WHyPGen Project activities had been gathered and collected Available for public in the WHyPGen website httpwhypgenbpptcomid

description.narrative: Average number of coordination activities of WESMA wind energy system manufacturers association each year starting Year 2

comment.narrative:
4
0
WHyPGen Project had initiated the establishment of Indonesia Wind Association IWA through meeting and FGD IWA was softly launched through declaration at the EBTKE Connex on 46 June 2014 EBTKE Connex is an annual event of seminar and exhibition that held by the Directorate General of New Energy Renewables and Energy Conservation DJEBTKE Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources MEMR For the next step the project will facilitate and support the legal aspect of the IWA establishment Afterward the project will collaborate with IWA to conduct the related activities in promoting the wind energy in the country including in advocating the required policies to the MEMR and other related government agencies
4
1 Preparation meeting of the Indonesia Wind Energy Association IWEA National Meeting
2 IWEA National Meeting
3 Regular meeting on IWEA management
4 Coordination Meeting on IWEA legal aspect establishment

description.narrative: Number of engineering schools that offer courses on wind energy technologies including WHyPGen applications in their engineering curricula by EOP

comment.narrative:
5 engineering school had identified applying the REWind hybrid curricula and make the program to improve the curricula
1 Sekolah Tinggi Teknik STT PLN
2 Universitas Indonesia UI
3 Universitas Diponegoro UNDIP
4 Universitas Gajah Mada UGM
5 Politeknik Bandung
WHyPGen will further develop programactivities that can improve the existing curricula
Furthermore WHyPGen Project also in the process of collaboration with Technical Education and Development Center for the mechanical electrical and industrial known as P4TKBMTI It is an educational institution owned by the Ministry for Education and Cultural of Republic of Indonesia It provides training for teachers in order to improve their knowledge and skill The trainings are specially designed for vocational school teachers P4TKBMTI also has the role in developing and improving the curricula for engineering school in the level of senior high school
WHyPGen Project has provided Training of Trainer ToT and On the Job Training OJT for Technical Education and Development Center for the mechanical electrical and Industrial known as P4TKBMTI The program will continue to the development of training module for the vocational school teachers Furthermore P4TKBMTI has included training on wind power technology as one of the training curricula in their institution It has been socialized on xxx 2014 in which WHyPGen Project has become one of the resources persons

description.narrative: Number of wind energy projects including WHyPGen projects that are designed and engineered by local technical service providers by EOP

comment.narrative:
3
1 The Detail Engineering Design DED of wind hybrid power generation at Karimata Island the Regency of Kayong Utara West Kalimantan was developed by a local service provider PT Asia Niaga Instrument The work was supported by WHyPGen Project and submitted to the Local Government of Kayong Utara for their follow up on the budget allocation and project implementation
2 The hybrid control system at Nusa Penida was developed by a local service provider PT TML The project will follow up the design once the rehabilitation of the power plant completed
3 PT SEI was involved in the repair of inverter system in Baron Techno Park

description.narrative: Improved local wind energy system including WHyPGen capacity
A fully established and operational wind energy clearing house by Year 2

comment.narrative: Year 2

In 2014 the project had supported the required information and data on the wind energy in Indonesia to support establishment of RE Clearing House by MEMR WHyPGen will continue to provide support on the activities
Currently MEMR is setting up the required rooms hardware and software Based on the discussion with MEMR WHyPGen Project will be asked to provide all the related information on wind energy project to support the clearing house ie wind potential data list of available technology supplier local manufacturer and other supporting documents Currently with the data from WHyPGen submitted on Feb 2014 MEMR with support from ESP3 program from the Danish government had developed wind potential map in a meso scale However the wind map was limited only to the Sumatera Island some parts of Java and Sulawesi island WHyPGen Project will develop Indonesia wind map in micro scale

description.narrative: No of trainings for local services providers and power project developers on the development of business plans and utilization of financial models for preparing bankable project proposals by Year 3

comment.narrative:
3
2
The project had conducted training on wind project business plan for the potential project developers and FGD for the local manufacturers
In collaboration with PT Sarana Multi Infrastruktur PT SMI the project conducted training on the bankable project proposal
1
The project has supported PLN in assessing the 50MW wind farm project at Samas Bantul Yogyakarta by providing training on both technical and financial aspects in assessing a wind farm proposal This training was a significant as capacity building program for the PLNs team and PLN Pusenlis as the technical consultant of PLN in evaluating a wind project proposal The training was conducted in October 2014 and the Power Purchase Agreement PPA of Samas was signed in May 2015 Capacity building for PLN was also conducted for the top management through the comparison study and field visit to the existing wind farm in Australia

description.narrative: Number of local banksFIs that provide affordable financing schemes for WHyPGen projects by EOP

comment.narrative:
1
WHyPGen project through UNDP Indonesia had signed an agreement with PT SMI in initiating the financing program for wind power project in Indonesia WHyPGen had allocated USD 300000 as grant facility to support the bankability of the wind power projects PT SMI will leverage the amount up to 10 times This collaboration is very strategic to ensure the commercial sustainability of investment in the WHyPGen Technology by the project developers This program is the first financing facility available for wind projects in the country
